divs: sighting detailsi was at the front yard with my dog when i looked up and saw a red-orange light hovering without any sound. i immediately tried to assess whether it was a plane or a helicopter. we see both of those often around here and i'm sure it wasn't either of them. it was at a high-flying chopper distance. it was at the northeastern direction from george mason university. i immediately called my family to witness this. i said "i think there's a ufo outside, you have to come and see this" they came and they saw it too. when my sister went back in to grab a camera, the light started fading out, slowly. it faded out and at last it seemed like a distant star and disappeared. when it was bright, it was about the size of 1\16th of a full moon.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fairfax
There were no other sightings in Fairfax on or around January 16th 2010
